com.pilot.jword
Class ParagraphProperties

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.ParagraphProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class ParagraphProperties
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

A data value class for transferring paragraph properties. Holds the paragraph properties for a range. null values indicate missing or nonuniform attributes

load

public void load(javax.swing.text.AttributeSet attr)
load values from an attributeset. The first call will set values, second and next calls will set previously set bu different values to null.
